title: Create Interactive CSS Popout Menu
description: In this lab, we will explore the fundamentals of CSS programming by creating a popout menu. The purpose of this lab is to help you understand how to use CSS to create interactive menus that appear on hover or focus. By the end of this lab, you will have a solid understanding of how to use CSS to create dynamic user interfaces.

meta.title: CSS Popout Menu | Interactive User Interface
meta.description: Learn to create a dynamic popout menu using CSS. Explore interactive user interfaces and enhance your web development skills.
meta.keywords: CSS, popout menu, user interface, web development, interactive design, HTML, CSS programming
